amendment.description: To extend by one year the date of the final report of the advisory panel on laws and regulations on acquisition practices and to require an interim report.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2500 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2500 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12593-12594) To extend by one year the date of the final report of the advisory panel on laws and regulations on acquisition practices and to require an interim report.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2500 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2500 proposed by Senator Warner.
